attributes.action: INTEREST ONLY LIFETIME PORTABLE MORTGAGE Investigate misleading title
attributes.additional_details:
INVESTIGATE the "small print" which covers this mortgage which renders it unworkable and essentially
totally contradictory to its TITLE.

INVESTIGATE the actions of this company that we have been with for 45 years that have totally wrecked our retirement.

MONITOR the time taken for cases to be assessed by the Ombudsman, and approach complex individual cases with more sensitivity.
